tags.data: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education. Theodore Roosevelt
Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality. Shawn Ashmore
Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better. Stefon Diggs
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude. Maya Angelou
Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one. Hans Selye
A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me. David Bailey
